content: There are many great food options near the Vatican. One popular option is Pizzarium, which has been rated as one of the best pizza places in Rome. Another option is La Locanda dei Girasoli, which serves authentic Italian dishes in a cozy atmosphere. There's also Roscioli, a famous deli that serves the best cured meats, cheeses, and traditional Roman cuisine. Finally, Caffè Vaticano is a historic coffee shop where you can enjoy your coffee and pastry while enjoying the view of St. Peter's Basilica. Don't hesitate to ask the locals for their recommendations as well!
